name: Chip to Stable
description:
Chip to Stable is a platformer game where the main player is a robot that has to help an electrical plant with some issues. With each move the robot drains its battery, which causes it difficulties to maintain balance while moving around.

This game was made under 48 hours for Geta Game Jam 12, the Theme was "Unstable". 

Move and Jump with the Arrow keys

Use Spacebar while in the air to activate the robot's Rockets. 

This is my first game ever, any type of feedback is well appreciated.
